channel.title: Threat-Hunting on Ctrl+Alt+Dark
channel.description: Recent content in Threat-Hunting on Ctrl+Alt+Dark

item.title: MSSQL Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Microsoft SQL Server forensics and threat hunting guide covering registry paths, log locations, attack indicators, and configuration analysis for compromised SQL Server instances.

item.title: Using NetTriage for IP & Domain Triage
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Automate IP and domain investigations with NetTriage, a Python tool that performs reputation lookups, DNS resolution, WHOIS checks, and passive DNS analysis for rapid threat triage.

item.title: IP & Domain Investigation Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Essential techniques for IP and domain investigations including reputation checks, WHOIS lookups, DNS inspection, passive intelligence, and payload retrieval for threat hunting and incident response.

item.title: Huntress - Weaponized Velociraptor Delivers Ransomware
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Investigation uncovered three distinct incidents where threat actors weaponized Velociraptor, a legitimate DFIR tool, for persistent command-and-control access. Attackers exploited SharePoint and WSUS vulnerabilities, installed Velociraptor as a Windows service communicating through Cloudflare tunnels, and deployed secondary tools including VS Code, OpenSSH, and TightVNC. One incident linked to Storm-2603 resulted in Warlock ransomware deployment.
